text: Nowell may refer to: *Nowell (name) *Nowell (surname) *Nowell Salmon (1835-1912), British Admiral of the Fleet and recipient of the Victoria Cross *Nowell Myres (1902-1989), British archaeologist and librarian *Nowell, Wisconsin, a ghost town *Nowell Codex, one of the four major Anglo-Saxon literature codices; contains the unique copy of the epic poem Beowulf ==See also== *"The First Nowell", also spelled "The First Noël", a traditional English carol
title: Nowell
